Staff Writer Thursday, January 27, 2011; 10:52 PM Mike Pence ( R-Ind.) will not run for president in 2012 but has left the door open to running for governor of the Hoosier State. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence said in a letter to supporters first reported Thursday by the Indianapolis Star.
